s9.message: Fixed: German translation won't be recognized in SeaMonkey

s8.message: Added a few tweaks to be compatible with EzSidebar

s3.message: Allowed blocking background images via context menu

s2.message: Added translations: Brazilian Portuguese, Dutch, Chinese Simplified, French

s10.message: Fixed: Toolbar icon tooltip claims the button opens Preferences

s16.message: Fixed: When moving to a whitelisted page the sidebar sometimes isn't updated

s5.message: Made it possible to drag images/links to the toolbar icon as well, not just the status bar

s6.message: Added localized description for the extension manager

s13.message: Fixed: When going back via history frames without blockable elements aren't listed any more

s15.message: Fixed: Frame contents sometimes appearing multiple times in the list

s12.message: Fixed: Whitelisted frames aren't shown as whitelisted in the sidebar

s4.message: Made sure there is no way for web sites to detect Adblock Plus

s11.message: Fixed: "Adblock Link/Frame" should not appear in the context menu if the link/frame is already blocked

s14.message: Fixed: Redirected frames appear with the wrong address in the sidebar
